trans-unit.source: Marshalling an array from unmanaged to managed requires either the 'SizeParamIndex' or 'SizeConst' fields to be set on a 'MarshalAsAttribute' or the 'ConstantElementCount' or 'CountElementName' properties to be set on a 'MarshalUsingAttribute'.
trans-unit.target: Marshalling an array from unmanaged to managed requires either the 'SizeParamIndex' or 'SizeConst' fields to be set on a 'MarshalAsAttribute' or the 'ConstantElementCount' or 'CountElementName' properties to be set on a 'MarshalUsingAttribute'.

trans-unit.source: The 'SizeParamIndex' value in the 'MarshalAsAttribute' is out of range.
trans-unit.target: The 'SizeParamIndex' value in the 'MarshalAsAttribute' is out of range.

trans-unit.source: The 'BlittableTypeAttribute' and 'NativeMarshallingAttribute' attributes are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: The 'BlittableTypeAttribute' and 'NativeMarshallingAttribute' attributes are mutually exclusive.

trans-unit.source: Type '{0}' is marked with 'BlittableTypeAttribute' and 'NativeMarshallingAttribute'. A type can only have one of these two attributes.
trans-unit.target: Type '{0}' is marked with 'BlittableTypeAttribute' and 'NativeMarshallingAttribute'. A type can only have one of these two attributes.

trans-unit.source: A native type with the 'GenericContiguousCollectionMarshallerAttribute' must have at least one of the two marshalling methods as well as a 'ManagedValues' property of type 'Span<T>' for some 'T' and a 'NativeValueStorage' property of type 'Span<byte>' to enable marshalling the managed type.
trans-unit.target: A native type with the 'GenericContiguousCollectionMarshallerAttribute' must have at least one of the two marshalling methods as well as a 'ManagedValues' property of type 'Span<T>' for some 'T' and a 'NativeValueStorage' property of type 'Span<byte>' to enable marshalling the managed type.

trans-unit.source: The native type '{0}' must be a value type and have a constructor that takes two parameters, one of type '{1}' and an 'int', or have a parameterless instance method named 'ToManaged' that returns '{1}' as well as a 'ManagedValues' property of type 'Span<T>' for some 'T' and a 'NativeValueStorage' property of type 'Span<byte>'
trans-unit.target: The native type '{0}' must be a value type and have a constructor that takes two parameters, one of type '{1}' and an 'int', or have a parameterless instance method named 'ToManaged' that returns '{1}' as well as a 'ManagedValues' property of type 'Span<T>' for some 'T' and a 'NativeValueStorage' property of type 'Span<byte>'

trans-unit.source: The specified collection size parameter for an collection must be an integer type. If the size information is applied to a nested collection, the size parameter must be a collection of one less level of nesting with an integral element.
trans-unit.target: The specified collection size parameter for an collection must be an integer type. If the size information is applied to a nested collection, the size parameter must be a collection of one less level of nesting with an integral element.

trans-unit.source: Only one of 'ConstantElementCount' or 'ElementCountInfo' may be used in a 'MarshalUsingAttribute' for a given 'ElementIndirectionDepth'
trans-unit.target: Only one of 'ConstantElementCount' or 'ElementCountInfo' may be used in a 'MarshalUsingAttribute' for a given 'ElementIndirectionDepth'

trans-unit.source: The specified parameter needs to be marshalled from managed to native, but the native type '{0}' does not support it.
trans-unit.target: The specified parameter needs to be marshalled from managed to native, but the native type '{0}' does not support it.

trans-unit.source: The specified parameter needs to be marshalled from native to managed, but the native type '{0}' does not support it.
trans-unit.target: The specified parameter needs to be marshalled from native to managed, but the native type '{0}' does not support it.

trans-unit.source: This element cannot depend on '{0}' for collection size information without creating a dependency cycle
trans-unit.target: This element cannot depend on '{0}' for collection size information without creating a dependency cycle

trans-unit.source: Count information for a given element at a given indirection level can only be specified once
trans-unit.target: Count information for a given element at a given indirection level can only be specified once

trans-unit.source: Multiple marshalling attributes per element per indirection level is unsupported, but duplicate information was provided for indirection level {0}
trans-unit.target: Multiple marshalling attributes per element per indirection level is unsupported, but duplicate information was provided for indirection level {0}

trans-unit.source: Marshalling info was specified for 'ElementIndirectionDepth' {0}, but marshalling info was only needed for {1} level(s) of indirection
trans-unit.target: Marshalling info was specified for 'ElementIndirectionDepth' {0}, but marshalling info was only needed for {1} level(s) of indirection

trans-unit.source: The provided graph has cycles and cannot be topologically sorted.
trans-unit.target: The provided graph has cycles and cannot be topologically sorted.

trans-unit.source: The '[In]' attribute is not supported unless the '[Out]' attribute is also used. The behavior of the '[In]' attribute without the '[Out]' attribute is the same as the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: The '[In]' attribute is not supported unless the '[Out]' attribute is also used. The behavior of the '[In]' attribute without the '[Out]' attribute is the same as the default behavior.

trans-unit.source: The '[In]' and '[Out]' attributes are unsupported on parameters passed by reference. Use the 'in', 'ref', or 'out' keywords instead.
trans-unit.target: The '[In]' and '[Out]' attributes are unsupported on parameters passed by reference. Use the 'in', 'ref', or 'out' keywords instead.

trans-unit.source: The provided '[In]' and '[Out]' attributes on this parameter are unsupported on this parameter.
trans-unit.target: The provided '[In]' and '[Out]' attributes on this parameter are unsupported on this parameter.

trans-unit.source: Marshalling bool without explicit marshalling information is not supported. Specify either 'MarshalUsingAttribute' or 'MarshalAsAttribute'.
trans-unit.target: Marshalling bool without explicit marshalling information is not supported. Specify either 'MarshalUsingAttribute' or 'MarshalAsAttribute'.

trans-unit.source: Marshalling char with 'CharSet.{0}' is not supported. Instead, manually convert the char type to the desired byte representation and pass to the source-generated P/Invoke.
trans-unit.target: Marshalling char with 'CharSet.{0}' is not supported. Instead, manually convert the char type to the desired byte representation and pass to the source-generated P/Invoke.

trans-unit.source: Marshalling string or char without explicit marshalling information is not supported. Specify either 'LibraryImportAttribute.CharSet' or 'MarshalAsAttribute'.
trans-unit.target: Marshalling string or char without explicit marshalling information is not supported. Specify either 'LibraryImportAttribute.CharSet' or 'MarshalAsAttribute'.

trans-unit.source: The native type '{0}' for managed type '{1}' must be a closed generic type or have the same arity as the managed type.
trans-unit.target: The native type '{0}' for managed type '{1}' must be a closed generic type or have the same arity as the managed type.

trans-unit.source: The '[Out]' attribute is only supported on array parameters.
trans-unit.target: The '[Out]' attribute is only supported on array parameters.

trans-unit.target: The '[Out]' attribute is not supported on the '{0}' parameter.

trans-unit.source: Runtime marshalling must be disabled in this project by applying the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute' to the assembly to enable marshalling this type.
trans-unit.target: Runtime marshalling must be disabled in this project by applying the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute' to the assembly to enable marshalling this type.

trans-unit.source: An abstract type derived from 'SafeHandle' cannot be marshalled by reference. The provided type must be concrete.
trans-unit.target: An abstract type derived from 'SafeHandle' cannot be marshalled by reference. The provided type must be concrete.
